mapper.select: SELECT ACH_NUM, M_ID, ACH_DTTM, ACH_GRANT, ACH_CONFIRM, BG_NUM, SIX_NUM, SG_NUM FROM active_hist WHERE M_ID = 'test2' ORDER BY ACH_CONFIRM
SELECT SG_NUM, SG_NAME, SG_START_DTTM, SG_END_DTTM, SG_LOCATION, SPORTS1_CD, SKILL_CD, AGE_RANGE, GENDER_CD, STATUS_CD, SG_OPTION FROM SGROUP WHERE SG_NUM = #{sg_num}
